game.name: Wind Child
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Five souls, brought together in a simple rescue mission, come to learn that they are more connected than they had believed. Classic RPG goodness and intriguing storyline with this RPG from Valkyria Studios.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Five souls, brought together in a simple rescue mission, come to learn that they are more connected than they had believed. Classic RPG goodness and intriguing storyline with this RPG from Valkyria Studios.

reviewHighlights.text: A gentle, atmospheric little game with a relaxing flow. Short but soothing.
I liked the game. It needed a little more development. Would I recommend it? Yes.
